attributes.action: Pay NHS staff a COVID19 Bonus
attributes.additional_details: This government has spent billions paying people to stay at home and stay safe. I think it is only right that they recognise that some people have not had that choice and unfortunately, some people have lost their lives. The NHS staff have had below inflation pay rises for the past decade and I believe to recognise the outstanding work they have performed during this very challenging time they should have some sort of bonus, after all the public are on their steps every Thursday supporting them.
attributes.background: Some sort of monetary payment to recognise the work under the most challenging circumstances the NHS staff have performed during this pandemic.
